pkgmetadata.longdescription: Finds Roots, Extrema and Inflection Points of a Curve // Implementation of Taylor Regression Estimator (TRE), Tulip Extreme Finding Estimator (TEFE), Bell Extreme Finding Estimator (BEFE), Integration Extreme Finding Estimator (IEFE) and Integration Root Finding Estimator (IRFE) for roots, extrema and inflections of a curve . Christopoulos, DT (2019) doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.17158.32324 . Christopoulos, DT (2016) doi:10.2139/ssrn.3043076 . Christopoulos, DT (2016) https://veltech.edu.in/wp- content/uploads/2016/04/Paper-04-2016.pdf . Christopoulos, DT (2014) arXiv:1206.5478v2 [math.NA] .
